solution_line_template: From Monday to Tuesday, Nico reads a total of {monday_pages} + {tuesday_pages} = <<{monday_pages}+{tuesday_pages}={mon_tue_total}>>{mon_tue_total} pages.
On Wednesday, he read a total of {total_pages} - {mon_tue_total} = <<{total_pages}-{mon_tue_total}={wednesday_pages}>>{wednesday_pages} pages.
